thread.title: Re: Actress Marg Helgenberger offers to show up at ICE check-ins to resist deportations
thread.title_full: Re: Actress Marg Helgenberger offers to show up at ICE check-ins to resist deportations

author: Eva_Galley
title: Re: Actress Marg Helgenberger offers to show up at ICE check-ins to resist deportations
text:
Actress Marg Helgenberger offers to show up at ICE check-ins to resist deportations Posted at 7:48 pm on February 13, 2017 by William A. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Actress Marg Helgenberger on Monday afternoon announced that she’d joined the #HeretoStay Network , “a group of people ready to fight for immigrants at risk of deportation.” I just joined the #HereToStay Network. I WILL show up for immigrants at ICE check-ins to resist deportations https://t.co/CvTjFiu9uU 
— Marg Helgenberger (@MargHelgen) February 13, 2017 
“I pledge to physically show up for immigrants in my community when they need me,” reads part of the pledge on the website. Trending
